snippet: Vicky Taylor, the IHT's communications director and an East London local, tells you the hippest places to go when you get stranded at the Games -- as we Londoners know you will.
abstract: Vicky Taylor, the IHT's communications director and an East London local, tells you the hippest places to go when you get stranded at the Games -- as we Londoners know you will.

headline.main: My Olympic London -- Or What to Do When Stranded by the Rain or Tube
